entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Castlegar
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:14 p.m. PDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 27.8Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Castlegar Airport 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 4 May 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 27.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 28 %
Dewpoint: 7.6°C
Wind: N 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Showers. High 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early in the morning. Showers beginning in the morning. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. High 16. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Showers at times heavy. Low 9.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Low 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 4 May 2023
